website_summaries.verdict: If you’ve tried wedge-style cushions and dislike gel padding, this firm, contoured seat is a winner. Long-lasting quality with a highly supportive design that works well for rehabilitation and chronic back pain.
pros: High quality, firm memory foam does a superb job of retaining shape even with frequent use
Contoured to promote healthy posture and evenly distribute weight for reduced pressure on the hips and back
Coccyx cutout keeps tailbones comfortable and pressure-free
Versatile design can be used in the car, office, or at home
cons: Sits high and might not be the best option for taller individuals
Very firm, which could be a pro or a con, depending on preference

customer_reviews.title: Great for pain
customer_reviews.text: I injured my tailbone in a snowboarding accident and has having unbelievable pain. I bought this on a whim and love it. I sit on this everyday at my office job 8-13 hours a day and have zero pain. I do sit on it with the opening to the back. Not sure if that’s how it’s supposed to work but it releaves the pressure on my tailbone and lower back.
customer_reviews.author: mcbarker

customer_reviews.title: Soothing & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My mother likes this cushion a lot. It is helping her with a sore spot on her tailbone and, we believe, keeping her from getting a worse sore in that area. We were afraid it was the beginning of a pressure sore (bed sore). She is finding it to be very soothing and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Annette R

customer_reviews.title: I really like the firmness of my memory foam cushion
customer_reviews.text: I really like the firmness of my memory foam cushion. It is very comfortable supports my lower back and allows me to sit correctly while at my desk and not hunch my shoulders. The sciatica pain in my right leg is alleviated!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Essential for a long plane ride
customer_reviews.text: Anticipating a level of discomfort on a planned 15 hour plane flight, I bought this cushion. Normally economy class seats leave me sore and stiff and unable to sleep, but this cushion made all the difference in the world. With the cushion in place I managed to sit for hour after endless hour, reading, watching movies, and getting quite a bit of sleep. I dreaded the long flight, but actually ended up enjoying it, and even arrived quite bright and cheery the other end. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Tren

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for after my fusion surgery
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after my fusion surgery. I was unable to sit to work and i am a freelance graphic designer So if I don't work I don't get paid time off. This did the trick. Took all the pressure off my tailbone and made it feasible to sit bad work for aboit an hour at a time. I'm still using it at my desk now 8 months post op. Nice fabric. Aboit 3 inches thick and dense. It does not squish down when you sit on it. Keeps us shape after 8 months. Cover is removable to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Sciatic nerve pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Seat is very comfortable. It does not slide off of any chair or seat - leather, wood, or upholstered. To provide that comfort, the cushion is two inches thick. That is fine in the house, but I have had to make adjustments in my car to raise the steering wheel, mirrors and seat position. Since day one, it has relieved the sciatic nerve pain I had developed in both legs.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A Wittke

customer_reviews.title: ... sits on a chair should own one of these amazing pillows. No more pain since using it
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who sits on a chair should own one of these amazing pillows. No more pain since using it !!!! Order one today if you love and cherish a pain free life :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never this company again
customer_reviews.text: Revising original 5 star review.. had this 2 months and it has split in half and broke. Had to fight for PARTIAL REFUND! Them said inhave to pay RESTOCKING FEE!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Office chair? Get a thinner pad instead.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office chair, it's perfectly comfortable. Unfortunately it doesn't really compress at all when you sit in it and it just becomes a 3" booster seat which throws off the back support of the chair entirely (some office chairs have adjustable support, the 3 inches is likely more than you can adjust for though). Would not recommend with any chair that doesn't have a solid straight back, if your chair has lumbar support get something thinner (would absolutely not recommend it be used in an office chair like pictured). Otherwise it's a fairly solid product but because it doesn't compress and doesn't work in an office chair like advertised, 3 stars. I gave it away.
customer_reviews.author: Logan H.

customer_reviews.title: this is one of the best things I have ever bought myself when it comes ...
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the best things I have ever bought myself when it comes to comfort - I am 5'4" and would have to adjust my seat in the car so much after my husband drove and this has eliminated that greatly! And I don't have back pain after I get out of the car - it's easy to transport too (since it doesn't attach) so I use it at the office to add more cushion to my seat and then again in the car. LOVE THIS! Highly recommend even if you don't have back problems and just want the added comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy M MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Started sweating right away, but that's not the major problem. I'm trying to figure out how to phrase this without offending too many people. If you're a guy and your chair sits level or tilts forwards, the raised front portion of the padding may cause pain. So fellas, unless your chair ( the part you sit on, not the back support ) can tilt back, pass because it's a pain in the ---- and it doesn't rhyme.
customer_reviews.author: BBS818

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE ON LEATHER -- PERIOD!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ruined the leather on my brand new expensive couch by staining it in black dots from the underside of this thing. Cheap dyes that run are the main suspect.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Shockley

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A recent accident (falling down a staircase) resulted in a bruised tailbone. Those are hard to heal and being a truck driver my life was getting miserable. I ordered this cushion in hopes of making my night go better. YES IT DID ! It's a little thicker than I expected but it works great and I can adjust my seat . As far as comparing the product to others ,I didn't. I'm sure there are others that compare and maybe even cheaper. But I went with a good quality company and Amazon recommended. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Greg D

customer_reviews.title: Great seat cushion
customer_reviews.text: I have a new car, and on my first trip my sciatica acted up, so I purchased this seat cushion in hopes it would help. And it did! Love it! It is very comfortable, and sits me up higher in the seat (I am short, so this is a plus). Also, I like that if I should decide not to use it, I just sit it in the backseat. I may decide to buy another for my front seat passenger. It was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn C

customer_reviews.title: $35 to change my life for the better. Well made
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble with my coccyx in my office chair, which is a Leap that costs big bucks. I put this cushion down and no longer have trouble standing up without the same pain. $35 to change my life for the better. Well made, well designed. Yeah, I'd buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: Norm de Ploom

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t help me at all. I recently had a tailbone injury and got this pillow to help. This pillow looks thick and firm but it’s the complete opposite. It was so thin, and squishy that it made my tailbone pain worse. I had better luck buying a donut-shaped pillow for $5. I emailed them explaining my problem with the pillow and they never got back to me about it. Definitely won’t order again.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Seat cushion.
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back and need the aid of extra cushioning when I sit for long periods. I have tried other cushions but this one is definitely the best. I have found . I have 2...one for my workstation chair and one for my car, and they really help.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not a cure for anything
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this thing it's extremely painful to sit for long periods of time and this morning I broke out in back spasms after owning this for 6 months. It doesn't provide any comfort or relief in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy

customer_reviews.title: I love this! And this is coming from a person ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! And this is coming from a person with 4 spinal surgeries, 3 of which was fusion, Fibromyalgia, sacroiliac joint disease, siactica,sciatica, and Osteopenia. I work at home and have to sit for a while and was unable to sit up for more than 30 mins without being in tremendous pain, now I'm sitting 2 hrs before I start felling pain and believe me, that's good for me. Now I'm getting the neck and lumbar as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is well-made and comfortable. It is a little bit strange at first because your tailbone sort of floats. I didn't have any particular issues with my tailbone I was just trying to get comfortable in a cheap uncomfortable chair at work. After a full day of sitting on the cushion I was much more comfortable by the end of the day. I am pretty big (6', 295 lbs) and sit almost all day (programmer) and this helped.
customer_reviews.author: chris Adams

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, helpful, comfortable, relief from pain.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I've owned three of the older model grey cushions, love them all but this one is my favorite, more firm and super supportive. I use them every day. Also, I really like the black color vs grey. Wish I had a mini portable version to carry around for coffee shops and restaurants. Having had one hip surgery and two torn hamstring connectors, this bum does not sit on hard wooden chairs anymore. To the makers....Please consider making a portable mini version that's like 1/3 the size of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder Twin

customer_reviews.title: A quality orthopedic cushion !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is for my husband who had spinal surgery a few months ago. He had been using normal square cushions since the surgery. After some searching I discovered this Orthopedic cushion on Amazon. I ordered it; it came in 2 days. My husband is very satisfied with it and we plan to order at least one more. That way we can leave one in the automobile and one in the house. The color is nice; the handle handy; the over-all look is professional. We are VERY pleased with the quality and comfort of the product. Thank you Xtreme Comforts.
customer_reviews.author: BLB

customer_reviews.title: We both are very happy with cushions
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 cushions. 1 for my daughter who has Scoleosis and 1 for me as I have Fibromyalgia. We both are very happy with cushions. We both will be traveling to TX by car so we also will be using the cushions in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Christoffersen

customer_reviews.title: Worst Cushion Ever...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cushion 5 months ago when I started working from home. My back hurts very bad when I use this cushion in my chair. In fact if I use it for 8 hours my back will hurt for 2 weeks. I have tried everything to make this cushion work. I do not believe this cushion helps at all. It is not comfortable, it’s hard. The placement doesn’t feel right. If you have a chair that sucks, buy a new chair with lumbar support. If you are like me at a computer all day On the phone, this cushion will hurt your hips, back, butt, everything hurts with this.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Stone

customer_reviews.title: I'm Behind This
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality cushion. It's thick and has just the right amount of give. I do a lot of computer work and my back and hind end would hurt after a few hours of sitting. This takes some pressure off of my tail bone. It feels really high quality. I plan to buy another for a Christmas gift for a family member who would appreciate a good cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. UnderstoodTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I'm a normal size person with a normal size office chair but this cushion is so small it's almost like sitting with a knot under my legs and not ...
customer_reviews.text: Too small,I would have given 5 stars if it weren't for the fact that it's very small. I'm a normal size person with a normal size office chair but this cushion is so small it's almost like sitting with a knot under my legs and not as comfortable as it could be if it were a lager size.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for office chair
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and as described, even though it was a little taller than I expected, when you sit on it is squishes down to size and you don't have to lower your office chair. The molded part you sit on fits comfortably, but if you don't sit on it perfectly centered, it feels like it's going to tip you over. Once you find the right location on your chair, though, it makes sitting so comfortable you forget to get up and stretch out every now and then. If it wasn't so tall, i'd consider taking it with me on long airline flights.
customer_reviews.author: Act162This

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, for flights plan ahead
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for long airline flights in economy class. After 6 - 8 hours, my tailbone would be killing me. I brought this cushion on a long flight last week. It worked well on a long flight. It is large and you need to plan accordingly for your carry on stuff. I used a gym bag for this cushion and a neck cushion and other small stuff.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: It looks just like in the picture
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like in the picture, i use it on my computer chair and i will say that i find that combo to be uncomfortable .It is smaller then chair itself and it slides around when you try to sit on it. It is very firm so if you like that it will be great for you. I find my legs to be hurting personally,so i fixed one issue of my tailbone not feeling hurt but inherited other of it feeling uncomfortable in other areas. Maybe it would feel better on different type of chair.
customer_reviews.author: Spa3

customer_reviews.title: This cushion is amazing! I love it
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is amazing! I love it! I was having lower back pain and upper thigh pain from sitting at work. I have put this cushion on my chair and the improvement is very noticeable. I am able to sit for longer periods without any pain. When I leave work I am no longer feeling pain in my lower back and legs. I like the removable cover feature and I cannot feel the 'cutout' at the back of the cushion at all which I worried about before purchasing. I have already highly recommended to my co-workers and I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Scovtribe

customer_reviews.title: The cushion is comfortable. The first impression is that it has good ...
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is comfortable. The first impression is that it has good quality. I bought this to use with my office chair, which has white leather. It got stains from the cushion's ink and doesn't come off.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Ko

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeling increasing hip pain while sitting at my desk for long periods of time. I was at a loss what was causing this until my wife mentioned this seat cushion may help. I was skeptical it would help, but within an hour of receiving and trying it I felt instant relief. The firmness is perfect and the way it allows my tail bone to rest lower then my hips takes all the pressure off of them. I will be ordering more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: Hard and not soft
customer_reviews.text: This is not soft it’s hard ! I sit above my desk hurts my back would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: rebecca a sand

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and made my hip & sciatic pain worse
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this pillow would do the trick for my hip and sciatic nerve pain. Unfortunately, the lumpy, bucket seating style of this cushion made it much worse.
customer_reviews.author: KGP

customer_reviews.title: Saved my coccyx
customer_reviews.text: Well really my saccariliac joints too. My chiropractor saw me bring it into his office to sit on in his uncomfortable chairs and then he ordered his very own. Too high for the car unless you’re a little person. Save your butt. It needs you and you need it.
customer_reviews.author: cantno

customer_reviews.title: Best cushion ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office chair as the previous cushion I had (different brand and “model”) wasn’t cutting it for me anymore. A few days of using it made a considerable change with my sciatica pain, meaning it had decreased quite a bit! It was awesome! I still have a slight dull ache but nowhere near the level I had before. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine

customer_reviews.title: Helps with spinal stenosis pain
customer_reviews.text: When I get a flare up and nothing is comfortable to sit on, I just put this cushion on whatever surface I'm going to sit on and I'm able to find some desperately needed relief. My daughter has some back problems too and liked my cushion so much that she bought one for her office chair.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel-Rah

customer_reviews.title: Great for back, but wished it were a little thinner
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to the measurements of the thickness. I thought it would give a little, but it's pretty firm. I used it in my car for a couple days before having to return it. It was great for my back, but the thickness made me sit up too high in my little car. For a bigger car, it would probably fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Heidegger

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for a car seat pad
customer_reviews.text: This pad, placed on an office chair might be perfect. My seat in my truck is heavily worn and I wanted to build some comfort back. This padding it too thick and firm to do that. I decided to cut it down to bolster my low spots. In cold weather, this pad is extremely firm until I warm it up (body heat), then it feels pretty good. We are heading into winter so I might have to remove it. Overall, a great product but not so good for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rumfield

customer_reviews.title: This is a solid cushion
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm not rating it higher is that sometimes, it seems too much and my coccyx actually aches. I need to use it only in small time periods. I probably could have used a simple cushion just for my office chair. Also, it sits rather high and doesn't go well with a shallow chair. I probably need to buy a deep seated chair. Blends nicely with the lumbar support cushion I bought from same maker. But, I still run into the problem of being pushed up and forward too much. Time to look for a new chair.
customer_reviews.author: Mg17

customer_reviews.title: The best cushion for sitting with sciatica or a bruised tailbone!
customer_reviews.text: When it hurts to sit, something that makes it comfortable brings such relief. We tried several and these are the very best. They are so helpful, we bought a second set to have at home and at our winter home. The carry bag makes it easy to take to athletic events or on flights. You will be glad to have one if you have a sore bottom.
customer_reviews.author: N. Berg

customer_reviews.title: Average seat cushion... not great like they used to make.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Xtreme Comforts seat cushion purchase. The first was two years ago after back surgery. The seat cushion was a perfect design for extended sitting -- dense memory foam, tight mesh cover, and floating tailbone design. It’s been a lifesaver working in the office at a desk. I bought the second one last month. It’s okay, but a noticeable quality drop-off from the first one. The memory foam is not as dense. The mesh cover is baggy and not tight fitted around the cushion. Unfortunately, they’ve taken a great product and turned it into an average one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve 4977

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my office chair to help relieve sciatica pain. Worked wonderfully!!! This cushion is well made. The grip bottom keeps it from moving around on my office chair. The cushion is extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for lower back - PC gaming
customer_reviews.text: The void at the lumbar really takes that pressure off at the lower back. I fight lower back tightness and neck impingement that really make gaming painful after a couple of hours. This pad really helps increase the longevity I can hang at the monitor. Easy to use, non-slip and at first you think how can this be comfortable, but then once you have been in it for a few the answer becomes self evident.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great to help hip and low back pain
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from hip pain and this has helped a lot. I am pretty new to having an office job and having to sit all day. This has really helped to relieve the pain on my lower back and hips.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vendor!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has back pain and can spend up to 12 hours a day sitting at the computer. He noticed a difference the first day he used it. He didn’t have any pain at all. Now we’re buying one for work. I wish I would of know of this years ago. Prompt shipment. Excellent vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Letizia

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace my 15 year old foam pillow and hopefully get something more comfortable. This isn't it. It's very firm, especially under the thighs. It does let me sit a couple of hours longer before my butt gets too sore. The fabric that covers it is rough to the feel even through clothes and it actually ends up chafing. It's a very small step up from my very old foam cushion. I"ll give another couple of weeks and if it doesn't get any better I'll return it. In the mean time I'll keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Blade Runner

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion to help support my back
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchasing this cushion. I have lower back issues and have a long commute to my office. This cushion has helped alleviate the pressure on my lower back. I felt the difference right away. I use one in the car and one on my office chair. Glad I found this and bought it.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Dont Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst seat cushion I've ever owned. Instead to helping my sciatica it caused more pain. I would NEVER recommend this cushion and the worst part is I couldn't return it because I took it to work and wrote my name on it so it wouldn't be stolen. Pure waste of my Damn money.
customer_reviews.author: Mythoughts

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my Coccyx Orthopedic Memory Foam Seat Cushion!! I use it on my folding chair t my computer. Gives me enough height that my legs don't cramp! Thank you!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Howard

customer_reviews.title: Love this Cushion
customer_reviews.text: I broke my tailbone 30+ years ago and have since suffered anytime I sat on a hard flat surface (bleacher, wooden chair, etc). I've even started having issues sitting on some padded chairs (dining room chairs.). I purchased this based on the advice of someone who has one and I have to say, I love this seat cushion. No more tailbone pain. It even makes me sit up straighter. Will not go anywhere without it now. One for home and one for work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it from the first day
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is SO comfortable. I didn't know how much my chair was hurting me until it wasn't. I'm a plus size gal and it doesn't give too much under me. It gives enough to be comfortable but feels firm enough that it won't be worn out in 3 months. The zip off cover for washing (let's be real about how many times we lose a bite of lunch at our desk) and the grips that grab my oak desk chair are excellent design features. I imagine it would be great to take in the car on road trips too.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina M

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my day who sits for work a lot and has back issues. He says it’s comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Staffeldt

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a different brand before this one and it was way too big for me. I'm a 5'3" woman and this seat cushion is perfect. I sit all day for my work. I recommend this cushion.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: This Cushion is a Lifesave!
customer_reviews.text: I have to spend many hours at my desk. Due to an old tailbone injury from my childhood, sitting for long periods of time causes me a lot of tailbone pain. The difference since getting this cushion is night and day! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relieves Sciatic nerve pain
customer_reviews.text: I use this cushion on my office chair, and also in my 1979 Pontiac Trans AM on long rides. Yesterday I drove from Charlotte to Athens Georgia. ( 3 1/2 hour drive) This cushion allows me to drive my 40 year old car with no sciatic nerve pain. Modern car seats are much more supportive, but my car is all original and is a collector car. This cushion allows me to keep my Bandit original but also alleviates my back pain on long drives. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: william t oakes

customer_reviews.title: The Cushion does boost you up a couple of inches, so you will have to adjust your car seat.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product for two days now, but it has relieved my sciatic nerve and hip pain while sitting. I don't have to get up and walk around every 10 minuets or so like before to get some relief. Much better working at the computer now. I also used it in my car and after adjusting the seat properly, it was comfortable for a drive to run errands. (no ache down the leg)
customer_reviews.author: Luv2Shop

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims, butt...
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from a trip from Maine to Georgia and back again, using this seat cushion. I will say that it did help reduce greatly the discomfort/pain I used to experience. The only problem was that it added a little pressure to the back side of my thighs. I.e. I always had discomfort there, but this cushion made it a little worse. we tend to drive 8-12 hour stretches, so if we had kept this to 6-8 it may not have been a problem. I don't use/need it around town, but on long trips I will definitely still use it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Soucy

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff. Made my back ache more.
customer_reviews.text: At first it felt supportive and I figured I need to break it in since it was new. After about three weeks, I kept having soreness and achenes sitting on this cushion. I took it off the seat and now I am back to my regular seat and its actually feels better without the cushion. It was a bit too stiff for me. I would imagine it may also be a factor in how much one weights. Maybe it might be more comfortable with someone who weighs more. Either way, its a give away to someone else to I'll donate it to a donation center.
customer_reviews.author: Nyla

customer_reviews.title: Great product to help you sit pain free
customer_reviews.text: This ushiom is a life saver! After a few hours of work, my legs were killing me - now I don’t have pain even after a full day of sitting and working! Definitely great buy. Product is as described, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Somlo

customer_reviews.title: Extreamly re ommend for people who has lowback pain and ...
customer_reviews.text: Extreamly re ommend for people who has lowback pain and who works for officework sitting all day . I wasnt able to sit down go work over 1 hour due to my lowback pain but with this I can sit all dah at work without a y pain !!
customer_reviews.author: JOANN LIM

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable....
customer_reviews.text: Much more comfortable than other seat cushions. Would be more comfortable for me if it was a about 3 inches wider over all since I have a wider seat. But still, I no longer have a sore tailbone.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for office work
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy into this cushion originally...but it really is an extremely helpful thing to have when you sit all day. I originally bought this for my car, but moved it into my office. It provides great support to my hips and back and allows my coccyx to sit without any pressure on it. There was a noticeable difference in the amount of back pain I had once I started using this. As someone with long legs, that added height you get sitting on it can cause issues while sitting at a desk, but it's minimal. I've had this cushion for 5 months and it's hasn't lost any height or elasticity. Definitely worth it. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: I put this in my car cause long drives hurt ...
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my car cause long drives hurt my tailbone, years ago I had broke my tailbone never did get back to normal. Its sits a little tall in my car but I just lower my seat and it really does help.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA HUDSON

customer_reviews.title: Works as lift cushion and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Use in my sportscar to see over the dash. Works perfectly and also keeps my lower back from hurting, if you've even been in a sporty car the car sets are not confortable. Im 4'11 works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: GiaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out for me. Maybe you though.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very well made. However, it didn’t fit me because it’s just not big enough. I needed something to fit the entire seat, not just the middle. I haven’t been able to find anything yet. This pillow might very well work for others. I need support for both thighs not just the tail bone.
customer_reviews.author: StevieGee

customer_reviews.title: cushion large and hard
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because the base of it was quite large, It took up a wide portion of a chair. More significant, it was very hard and uncomfortable for me. That’s not to say it might not have worked for a large heavy set person. I am 5’2” and weigh 119 lb, and am very thin. For me, it was extremely uncomfortable. I was disappointed because I need a cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Tall Bamboo

customer_reviews.title: Provides added cushion but causes some pressure on tailbone.
customer_reviews.text: This product is “okay.” I’m 7 months pregnant and purchased it for extra support a few months ago and while it does provide much needed padding in my office chair, I have experienced some pressure on the tailbone (which hits right around the back edge of the cushion) after sitting all day at work. It’s still worth the money due to the added comfort from a regular desk chair but purchase with caution if you have lower back/tailbone pain.
customer_reviews.author: Hthomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Cushion
customer_reviews.text: This seat cushion is well made, and comfortable. Worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Horton Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I'd recommend this to anyone. It's better than sitting on a hard surface, but it isn't "soft". It isn't especially "comfortable", and it definitely compresses after sitting on it for a short time and becomes pretty uncomfortable. I'm 180lbs--not obese by any measure, so I can only imagine that they must be either testing this with children or don't have the same definition of "comfortable" that I do. It's not terrible, but it's not what I wanted, either.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Blumenkrantz

customer_reviews.title: Would be fine for sciatica but not when sciatica and hamstring injury are combined.
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is very hard after sitting on it awhile. Maybe if I hadn’t recently had a hamstring injury I wouldn’t mind it so much. A physical therapist gave me a tip that is more comfortable for me while I recover from the hamstring injury and maybe when recovery is complete I will find the cushion easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Nonna

customer_reviews.title: I am going to buy another one
customer_reviews.text: It is so very comforting, l can sit with out any pain on my tailbone. I didn’t know this coushion existed.
customer_reviews.author: mary ann guevara

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but tends to flatten out
customer_reviews.text: It is incredibly comfortable and makes a huge difference initially. I only wish it did not flatten so much because it makes it difficult to use for long periods of time and on certain surfaces. Overall I do enjoy it, but I am worried it won't last more than a year. I have only had this for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Might work for some, but not me and my sciatica.
customer_reviews.author: George A. Franke

customer_reviews.title: Quickly relieved back pain for both of us
customer_reviews.text: I bought the coccyx pillow first because I was having lower back pain. My office chair has lumbar support, so I didn't need that pillow. No mor back pain, love it. Then my boyfriend started having back issues, and his chair had no lumbar support, so I got him this set. It also succeeded in relieving his back pain. Other folks in his office also loved it and bought these. Highly recommended. For the price and relief of back pain, you really can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the reviews I received. I’m sooooo disappointed. This product does nothing to help ease my sciatica because the space between the opening is too small so a person can not open their legs to wide. Plus the pillow is too thick for certain chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Vannie

customer_reviews.title: Don't keep in vehicle with winter temps!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband to use I truck as we travel for his work. He does like it but I will update after we go on a longer trip. The only thing he doesn't like is that if it's cold outside you don't want to leave it in the truck...he said it gets really hard and stays too cold.
customer_reviews.author: Bill n Deb

customer_reviews.title: game changer
customer_reviews.text: My daily 1hr+ commute each way (sometimes as much as 2hrs total) had me in excruciating leg pain to the point that I dreaded getting in the car. A friend recommended this cushion and I bought it despite my skepticism: "It'll never work!" Well, it worked. A lot. The first day of using it, no pain. And none since. I will say, the cushion causes you to sit high in the driver's seat, and it kinda messes with my posture a bit, but my commute no longer ends in searing daggers in my legs. Totally worth it, and I may bring it with me on a long-distance flight coming up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great for pregnancy pains!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this pillow for my office desk chair. It helps relieve the aches and pains I've been experiencing due to my pregnancy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: This is making my life just a little better. I'm trucker 300lbs and this doesn't flatten out
customer_reviews.text: This is making my life just a little better. I'm trucker 300lbs and this doesn't flatten out. I sit for about 10+ hours on it. The reason I gave 4 stars is because it would be nice if they had one that is a little wider for us hefty folks. But, dont let this detour you from buying.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Seems very well made
customer_reviews.text: Its durable and good quality. I just think its a too thick. So it's hard in my office chair. It keeps moving on the chair too. So it's hard to get comfy and stay in position. So kinda disappointed in those 2 areas. Its comfortable as far as the cushion is concerned. Might have to buy a thinner one if I can find one.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Nolette

customer_reviews.title: Hate it and love it
customer_reviews.text: I hate that I have to use this cushion because it makes me feel like an old man. It's not super comfortable and can move around a lot. That said, I use it in my car, which I'm in all day Monday thru Friday for work and it prevents 90% of the pain I was getting from my car seat being horrible on the lower half of my body. I'm super impressed and it has been a game changer. I'd also say give it a few days to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Poleto

customer_reviews.title: Can’t recommend enough for tailbone pain...
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even begin to tell you how much this helped me. I took a really nasty hard fall down my unfinished basement steps, landing directly of my tailbone. It hurt to walk, stand, sit, lay down.🙄 I missed work because I couldn’t sit or stand. Haha! So after a week of this, I broke down and bought this. Finally I could sit without the pressure on my tailbone. I took it everywhere with me. Around the house, other peoples house, car, work, restaurants (yup!). My tailbone took months to heal and this helped me along the way.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: This is one of those products I am so greatful that exists and I found!
customer_reviews.text: My sister had recommended this product to me so much because it helped her endure her lower back and buttock pain and she carries her seat cushion with her everywhere that I finally got one and I noticed the difference the first day I used it! My pain is almost absent during my whole work day using this seat cushion at the office and so I got a second one to use at home and where I go because otherwise my pain is impossible to sit. I am very happy and I will recommend this to anyone with cyatic pain, sacroiliac joints disorder and any other lower back and buttock pain sufferer without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: MSerna

customer_reviews.title: This cushion is a life-saver
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend bought me this cushion when I first severely bruised my tailbone a year or so ago because I was constantly complaining about the donut not really helping at all. I loved it so much that I brought it into the office to use even after my tailbone got better. Fast-forward a year and I fall down the stairs and bruise it again. Bought another one to use at the house and in the car! I even convinced my coworkers to buy one for the office. It really helps with your back problems and makes driving long hours in your car bearable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: hannahtheham

customer_reviews.title: Best seat cushion I ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for this seat cushion and amazing support! I originally was going to buy one with the back cushion included but decided on this one after reading the reviews. It was a very good decision! I don't even need a cack cushion while using this. The opening in the seat for lumbar and coxic support is perfectly positioned. The cushion is solid yet comfortable. It will not sink down to flat like some of them do. It's so good, I bought a second one for my sister!
customer_reviews.author: Albert L. Horney Jr.

customer_reviews.title: hard cushion
customer_reviews.text: i hated this. it was hard and uncomfortable. i passed it along to the thrift store.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Miller

customer_reviews.title: not for me...but did work for client
customer_reviews.text: I recommended this for a client and he loves it. He is also 6'2" and fits him nicely. For me the cushion is to high and to hard for my bum. I am 5'5". Medium weight. I need something softer and not so high up. However my client ( I am an exercise specialist for seniors). He's had sciatica problems and swears by this cushion. So I don't think there is anything wrong with this product, it's just a personal preference. I would still recommend. Just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile for me to see results. But now I feel amazing my tailbone does not hurt nearly as much and I'm able to sit without pain. Or pain when I get up. All I can say is awesome! I can now sit at the kitchen table in my rocking chair and even on the floor. I love my cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Belladonna

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the sizes correctly when ordering it.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product yet it's not big enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas T Morris

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This pillow it too stiff, too thick and not easily adjustable while sitting. It's so thick, that to adjust it, I have to stand up several times to get it in the right place due to it's "gripping" quality of the fabric. My office chair is adjusted to a comfortable height for me, but this adds about 3" to it and I have to stand up, aim and flop down on it and hope it's in the right position. It's too stiff and firm to be comfortable. If you can, before you buy this, check out options in a store first, see what works. I hate to say it, but this made the pain worse.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Strong

customer_reviews.title: Relief At Last
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is amazing. I have been suffering from Sciatica pain for a few years and the pain has intensified in the last 6 months. Siting for any long period of time is miserable for me and intensifies the shooting pain down my leg and throbbing in my hip area. My commute to work is over an hour and I have an office job, so sitting is inevitable. Ever since I started using the Coccyx Orthopedic Memory Foam Cushion, my discomfort has almost disappeared completely!! I could feel the difference in under a week!! I would recommend this cushion to anyone who has tried other remedies that have failed. I take this cushion with me everywhere!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy W. Burnett

customer_reviews.title: however the reason I purchased it was because it stated it was good for wheelchair use
customer_reviews.text: The pad is quite firm and provides the comfort and support advertised. As a normal product I would give this a 4 or 5 star rating, however the reason I purchased it was because it stated it was good for wheelchair use. It is NOT, it provides too much lift to the point that it is at an unsafe height. Because I felt the washable nonslip cover is excellent and the foam is very good quality I will be modifying it by cutting %25-50 off the thickness to see if it still provides good comfort at a safe thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Gianferante

customer_reviews.title: Body comfort & product construction PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Deluxe originally to use for an event sitting through a 4 hr. rock concert on the old fashioned wooden school auditorium seats because no way could my butt or hips deal with the bare wood. Oh! Absolute HEAVEN! Not only did totally protect my body from discomfort it also lifted me up enough so that I wasn't squashed between the arms of the seats. I also tried it as a padding on the seat of my fabric fold up lawn chair and once again absolute HEAVEN! Comfort, good price, good construction, attractive carrying case. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Taras

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF THE BEST PURCHASES I'VE MADE
customer_reviews.text: I had to go back and look at the directions that were included to see which way this was supposed to sit. At first I thought, "this isn't going to be very comfortable" but once I sat on it for a minute, with it going the right direction lol, I ABSOLUTELY LOVED IT! My chair was getting flat and worn out, so I opted for this before I bought a new chair and I'm really glad I did. It really is amazing. My back isn't sore anymore, neither is my tailbone. I also thought it might make me sit up to high, but it doesn't at all.
customer_reviews.author: LB Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helpful
customer_reviews.text: Product does help to relieve back pains and sciatic pinch nerve. I bought this product due to back pains during my pregnancy. I bought another for a friend due to her sciatica and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable for back pain
customer_reviews.text: This was a saving grace for my sciatica. I used it on my car, home, and office. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cg

customer_reviews.title: Relieves pain associated with bulged discs
customer_reviews.text: I have moderate bulged discs at L2-L3, L3-L4, L4-L5, and L5-S1 with crazy left leg pain. Just getting off the couch hurts. I was skeptical but this really works! I have to sit for long hours at track meets on bleachers & this has literally saved me. I even use it now for sitting on the couch. It seems too simple of a solution, and it hasn't fixed my back by any stretch, but the pain from sitting has gone way down. This cushion combined with Naproxen twice a day has made the constant inflammation less of an issue. I HIGHLY recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: rodney

customer_reviews.title: You’ll Take This Cushion Many Places
customer_reviews.text: High quality product that reduces, not eliminates my back pain. I use it in my car, when I sit on the floor, or When it’s necessary to sit on chairs without cushions.
customer_reviews.author: RickR

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.text: So far I find this product to be comfortable and helpful with back support.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Bailey

product_meta.title: Coccyx Orthopedic Memory Foam Seat Cushion - Helps with Sciatica Back Pain - Perfect for Your Office Chair and Sitting on The Floor Gives Relief from Tailbone Pain
feature_bullets: Size 18" x 14" x 3".. GET RELIEF FROM BACKACHE & PAIN WHILE SITTING : It's a FACT that flat, hard and even traditionally padded cushion seats cause pressure on your Tailbone resulting in Pain, Poor posture, Improper spine alignment, Decreased blood circulation, Pinched nerves & Orthopedic problems.

THE ORTHO-SEAT MEMORY FOAM COCCYX SEAT CUSHION IS ERGONOMICALLY DESIGNED WITH A DOCTOR RECOMMENDED U shaped cut out, creating a COCCYX COMFORT SPACE that allows your tailbone to "float" rather than being compressed against the seating surface bearing the weight of your body. The CONTOUR SURFACE DESIGN distributes body weight across the seat, relieving pressure points on tailbone and lumbar.

PROMOTES HEALTHY POSTURE, Proper Lumbar Spine Alignment, Reduced Back Pain, Increased Blood Flow To The Legs & Superior Comfort. Helps Relieve Pain From Back Injuries, Herniated, Bulging Or Degenerated Disc, Sciatica Nerve Pain, Arthritis, Hip Pain, Sacral Joint Pain, Stenosis, Hemorrhoids, Pregnancy And Other Conditions - Experience extreme comfort

NON SKID ANTI SLIP BOTTOM KEEPS SEAT CUSHION IN PLACE: - Best for Office Chair, Computer Desk, Kitchen, Dining room, Living room, Drivers Patio, Couch, Recliner. Take it with you to Sporting Events to use on Benches and Bleachers, your butt with thank you. Great for Car seat cushion, Truck Driver, Train & Airplane Travel, Truckers. Place it on the floor for Yoga, Meditation or as a Kneeling Pad Cushion for Tasks. Also Rocking Chairs for elderly and Nursery.

ULTRA DELUXE BODY ACTIVE MEMORY FOAM keeps its shape NEVER GOES FLAT! It remains uniform in density, conforming to provide you with the support you need for comfortable seating time after time! Your tush will feel the cush. - The durable, zippered removable, black MESH COVER is MACHINE WASHABLE and provides SUPERIOR AIR CIRCULATION AND BREATHABILITY while standing up to tough everyday use - NO QUESTIONS ASKED - MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. If you aren't 100% satisfied, simply return it within 2 years!
